mapper.select: SELECT count( 1 ) 'value' , CASE state WHEN 1 THEN '业绩' WHEN 2 THEN '荣誉' WHEN 3 THEN '科研' END 'name' FROM `table` WHERE user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY state
SELECT d.id name, count( 1 ) value FROM table_state d, ( SELECT b.state, b.id FROM `table` a, table_state b WHERE a.state = b.id and user_id = #{id}) c WHERE c.state = d.id GROUP BY d.id

SELECT a.table_name, a.id FROM `table` a, table_state b WHERE a.state = b.id and user_id = #{id} and b.id in( select a.id from table_state a,table_state b where a.state= b.id and b.id in( #{state1},#{state2}))
